titleStmt.title: Seven particulars, containing as followeth, I. Against oppressors. II. Magistrates vvork and honor. III. A meditation for magistrates upon Dan. 12.4. IV. Of hanging for theft, filling the land with blood. V. To the high & lofty in the earth, who exalt themselves by discent or blood. VI. Of ministers maintenance, two extreams. VII. Of persecuting for speaking in the synagogues (by many called churches.) Given forth for publique service by W.T.
titleStmt.author: Tomlinson, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at his shop at the Black spread-Eagle, neer the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
